meanings.definition: To resign from a position or office.
meanings.sent1: She was demitting her role as team captain.
meanings.sent2: He decided to demit his job to pursue a new career.
meanings.sent3: After demitting as president, he planned to travel the world.
meanings.sent4: The CEO demitting his position was a shock to the company.
meanings.sent5: The act of demitting his duties left a void in the organization.

meanings.definition: To give up or relinquish a claim or right.
meanings.sent1: The country was demitting its territorial claims.
meanings.sent2: She demitted her ownership of the property to her sister.
meanings.sent3: He demitted his dessert to save room for the main course.
meanings.sent4: The demitting of his inheritance surprised everyone.
meanings.sent5: The decision to demit his claim to the throne was unexpected.
